ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Individual_Coaching' ), ISPICKVAL( ProductRequestID__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design'), ISBLANK( Outcomev2__c ), Mark_Design_Stage_as_Complete__c = true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Outcomes” is required to update the Product Request Status.
